resources.string: Access your health and fitness data from Garmin devices to get personalized insights and recommendations.
This app is compatible with Garmin Connect
WellTrack would like to access your Garmin health and fitness data to provide personalized insights and recommendations.

By connecting your Garmin account, you grant WellTrack permission to:

• Access your health metrics from Garmin devices
• Combine Garmin data with other health sources for comprehensive analysis
• Display your Garmin data with proper attribution
• Store your data securely with encryption

You can revoke this permission at any time through your Garmin Connect account settings.
How We Use Your Garmin Data

Your Garmin data is used to provide personalized health insights, track progress toward fitness goals, and generate comprehensive health reports. We may combine Garmin data with other health sources you\'ve connected to provide more complete analysis.

We do not sell or share your Garmin data with third parties for marketing purposes. Data may be shared only with your explicit consent, in aggregated anonymized form for research, or as required by law.
Your Garmin data is retained until you delete your account or revoke Garmin access. You can delete your Garmin data at any time through the app settings.
Disconnecting your Garmin account will stop new data synchronization. Existing Garmin data will be preserved unless manually deleted.
Are you sure you want to disconnect your Garmin account?

To disconnect WellTrack from your Garmin account:

1. Open the Garmin Connect app or website
2. Go to Account Settings > App Management
3. Find WellTrack and select "Remove Access"

You can also disconnect through WellTrack Settings > Connected Apps > Garmin.
This will permanently delete all Garmin health data from WellTrack. This action cannot be undone.
Are you sure you want to delete all Garmin data? This cannot be undone.
Failed to connect to Garmin. Please try again.
Network error. Please check your connection and try again.
Garmin service temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
Garmin attribution required for this data
This report includes data from Garmin devices. For more information about Garmin\'s privacy practices, visit garmin.com/privacy/
This app participates in the Garmin Connect Developer Program
Get comprehensive health insights from your Garmin data

• Heart rate variability analysis
• Recovery and stress monitoring
• Fitness age and VO2 max tracking
• Sleep quality insights
Your Garmin data is encrypted and secure. You maintain full control over your data and can disconnect at any time.

Try these steps:

1. Ensure Garmin Connect app is installed and updated
2. Check your internet connection
3. Verify your Garmin account credentials
4. Try disconnecting and reconnecting
Heart Rate Variability measures the variation in time between heartbeats, providing insights into your autonomic nervous system and recovery status.
Training Recovery Score helps you understand when your body is ready for your next workout based on sleep, HRV, and stress data.
Stress Score uses heart rate variability to gauge your body\'s stress levels throughout the day.
Fitness Age compares your fitness level to others of different ages based on your VO2 max and other health metrics.
